errors.error_description: In the 'Advanced Usage' section, the link for 'how to add a new task' points to a non-existent file `docs/new_dataset_guide.md`. This results in a 404 error.
correction_candidates: Correct the link to point to 'CONTRIBUTING.md'.
Correct the link to point to 'docs/adding_a_model.md'.
Correct the link to point to 'docs/adding_a_dataset.md'.
errors.golden_answer: Correct the link to point to 'docs/adding_a_dataset.md'.
